text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG STRIX SCAR GL703GM Gaming and Entertainment Laptop (Intel i7-8750H 6-Core, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD, 17.3" Full HD (1920x1080), NVIDIA GTX 1060, Wifi, Bluetooth, Webcam, 4xUSB 3.1, Win 10 Home)!

The ASUS ROG STRIX SCAR GL703GM Gaming and Entertainment Laptop (Intel i7-8750H 6-Core, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD, 17.3" Full HD (1920x1080), NVIDIA GTX 1060, Wifi, Bluetooth, Webcam, 4xUSB 3.1, Win 10 Home) does what it says on the tin. Good for competitive gaming, but the trackpad could be better. Had a minor issue with the initial setup taking longer than expected, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG STRIX SCAR GL703GM Gaming and Entertainment Laptop (Intel i7-8750H 6-Core, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD, 17.3" Full HD (1920x1080), NVIDIA GTX 1060, Wifi, Bluetooth, Webcam, 4xUSB 3.1, Win 10 Home)!

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Apex Legends, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the ASUS ROG STRIX SCAR GL703GM Gaming and Entertainment Laptop (Intel i7-8750H 6-Core, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD, 17.3" Full HD (1920x1080), NVIDIA GTX 1060, Wifi, Bluetooth, Webcam, 4xUSB 3.1, Win 10 Home). The keyboard is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Starfield. The build quality of the ASUS ROG STRIX SCAR GL703GM Gaming and Entertainment Laptop (Intel i7-8750H 6-Core, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD, 17.3" Full HD (1920x1080), NVIDIA GTX 1060, Wifi, Bluetooth, Webcam, 4xUSB 3.1, Win 10 Home) is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
